info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 08 at 5:28PM CST until January 08 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Beauregard Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana... East central Newton County in southeastern Texas... * Until 615 PM CST. * At 527 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bon Weir, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Newton, Rosepine, Merryville, Bon Weir, Junction, Stringtown, Evans, and Pickering. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southwestern and west central Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.
